name: Space Ballet
summary: During an economic crisis in the far future, you are in charge of a small group of scavengers who are trying to collect crystals in order to sell them on the black market.
storyline: During an economic crisis in the far future, you are in charge of a small group of scavengers who are trying to collect crystals in order to sell them on the black market.
